Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a kind of nonlinear, multi-input-multi-output (MIMO) system that is hard to model by the traditional methodologies.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: For the purpose of dynamic simulation and control, this paper reports a dynamic modeling study of SOFC stack using a Hammerstein model.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: The static nonlinear part of the Hammerstein model is modeled by a radial basis function neural network (RBFNN), and the linear part is modeled by an autoregressive with exogenous input (ARX) model.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: To estimate the hidden centers, the radial basis function widths and the connection weights of the RBFNN, a new gradient descent algorithm is derived in the study.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: On the other hand, the least squares (LS) algorithm and Akaike Information Criteria (AIC) are used to estimate the parameters and the orders of the ARX model, respectively.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: The applicability of the proposed Hammerstein model in modeling the nonlinear dynamic properties of the SOFC is illustrated by the simulation.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: At the same time, the experimental comparisons between the Hammerstein model and the RBFNN model are provided which show a substantially better performance for the Hammerstein model.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model

Sentencas: Furthermore, based on this Hammerstein model, some control schemes such as predictive control, robust control can be developed.
Titulo: Nonlinear dynamic modeling for a SOFC stack by using a Hammerstein model
